front.title: Benchmarking Methodology for EVPN and PBB-EVPN

abstract.t: This document defines methodologies for benchmarking EVPN and PBB- EVPN performance. EVPN is defined in RFC 7432, and is being deployed in Service Provider networks. Specifically, this document defines the methodologies for benchmarking EVPN/PBB-EVPN convergence, data plane performance, and control plane performance.
